title: Leaver Buster
body: Hi guys. I recently was in a game as Ryze, and I dc'ed around 15 mins into the game. (I dc'ed because my wifi stopped working, and I later got back on using my iPhone's personal hotspot). We were winning up until I dc'ed, I presume, as when I got back into the game at around 25 mins, the enemy team was at our inhib, and we had only gotten their tier 1 top and bottom towers. We actually ended up winning the game, and I finished as 7/2/5 if I believe (check my op.gg if that's wrong), but I still got the "Leaver Buster" ban for 5 games. Is there any way that I can uplift this because my team won, and I did well, or do I just have to face the consequences? Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
I think it's just the automatic Leaver Buster punishing you for leaving your team at a disadvantage (even though it's not your fault), despite the fact you won :/.

This has happened to me before and I don't think there is much you can do other than wait the Leaver Buster out, you might find it'll be finished quicker than you think! ;D. Good luck!

I know it feels bad, and it's happened to myself before even, but this is the gist of it really. Even though you won, it doesn't erase the time your team spent trying to make a comeback without you there. You also don't get this kind of punishment for just one afk, but the system started to notice a trend.
